alert.note: Alert for Cook (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 7:16PM EDT until July 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cook County in south central Georgia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 716 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adel, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Adel, Sparks, Cecil, Reed Bingham State Park, Cook Co A/P, Massee, Greggs, Barneyville, Laconte and Pine Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
